title: 关于耀魂
author: mengyuya
txt_content: 附魔的耀魂的获取方法有哪些（包含耀魂宝珠，耀魂碎片等）

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcmod.cn/item/37501.html
https://www.mcmod.cn/item/8810.html
https://www.mcmod.cn/item/9741.html
结晶 碎片 宝珠的获取方式和用途都在此

replies.author: 凛夜丶雨月
replies.txt_content: 拔刀剑断了会随机掉落附魔的耀魂
